author: jeffbi
body:
Exceptions might be thrown if the referenced DLL is not present
or if the native function is not found.

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: Also do you have cases where exceptions are thrown?  Is it possible to write tests for specific platforms for this?

comments.author: jeffbi
comments.body:
Exceptions should not be thrown out of the cmdlet. If the cmdlet fails to query say, Win32_BIOS, it just moves on, leaving the Bios* properties null.

title: Add wrappers around native API calls to catch exceptions. (#3023)
